forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thunderstorms this evening giving way to periods of light rain late. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers early, then mainly cloudy after midnight with light rain possible. Low 51F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
